ActImmigration and Refugee Protection Act
PrecisReappointment of ROBERT ALLAN MARKOVITS of Toronto, Ontario, as a full-time member of the Immigration and Refugee Board (Toronto Regional Office), to hold office during good behaviour for a term of three years, effective March 16, 2012.
